keywhiz.auth.mutualssl

Class CertificateSecurityContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • keywhiz.auth.mutualssl.CertificateSecurityContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext

    public class CertificateSecurityContext
extends Object
implements javax.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext
    #getUserPrincipal() returns a CertificatePrincipal to expose the client's certificate chain. This can be useful for more granular authorization, for example on a resource.
